resources.string: This app was created by Artom Didinchuk.
This App can store locations that you have previously visted or custom locations anywhere in the world.

To store your current location press the \"SAVE CURRENT LOCATION\" button on the bottom left of the screen. You can enter a label and descrption for the spot (Both are optional but if both are left blank it might be hard to tell locations apart if you add multiple.)

To store a custom location press the \"SAVE CUSTOM LOCATION\" button on the bottom right of the screen. You can enter a label and descrption for the spot like before but also specify latitude and longitude coordinates (It will default to whatever the map is currently centered on.)

Once a location is saved it will show up at the bottom in the corresponding list. You can delete saved locations by pressing their \"DELETE\" buttons. You can also press the name of the location to move the map to that location.
